trans-unit.source: View 1 - displays only checkboxes and dates without folders
View 2 - displays only checkboxes and dates in two different folders

1) This folder is displayed when at least one of the checkboxes field in the folder "Checkboxes and radio" is checked. Please take a look at edit View configuration in the SAV Library Kickstarter to see how a folder can be dynamically changed.
2) This folder illustrates how views can be dynamically changed based on the value of a field.
Select a view then click on the "save and show" button or save and then click on the show button.
The displayed view depends on the value of the radio button. Please take a look at the SAV Library Kickstarter. - Two new views, "View 1" and "View 2", have been added. - Conditional views with condition fields have also been added to the form "Test".
3) This folder illustrates also the use of localization tags, i.e. $$$label$$$ tags. The labels are defined in the language file of this extension (Resources/Private/Language).
